 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָפַד‎</span>] **verb Pi\`el** ==gather together, roll up== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***wind*** turban ***snugly***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎קְפַד‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Ithpe\`el ***be drawn in, together***; also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוּפְדָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***porcupine***; so Arabic (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">)<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (compare [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 182</sup>), Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִפַּדְתִּי‎</span> [[Isa.38.12|Isa 38:12]] ***I have rolled up***, like a weaver, my life (i.e. finished it; [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]<sup>Lex 13</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּ‎</span>- [of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>], but 3 masculine singular following of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>).
